column4: im looking to utilize my Gateway Tablet PC in linux and i was looking to find some software and drivers to get it up and running, can anyone help?

you can check the hardware list in ubuntu to see if your hardware is supported or has any special things to know about running ubuntu on it  https://wiki.ubuntu.com/HardwareSupport , also check your model in the forum
